|brand = Lite-On |model = WN4627 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = R |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = September 12, 2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Lite-On_WN4627R |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = (non-standard connector) |formfactor = internal wireless module
|vendor_id = 0471 |device_id = 2126 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 24:FD:52
|chip1 = Ralink;RT5372; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "323C1634738D" (or "323C163472YD" [??] in the datasheet) and "WN4627R V03 Auden" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Per the FCC datasheet... *The device is shown with a MAC label affixed to the back of the board. The MAC has a 24:FD:52 ('''Lite-On''') OUI.. It is presumed to be used. *The USB ID is stated as 0471:2126 <small>(VID 0471 is '''Philips''')</small>. <small>It would be nice if that is not completely wrong.</small> *The USB connector is specified as an '''A1253WVA-S-06P'''. This would appear to be from [http://www.hr-connector.com.tw/ '''Joint Tech Electronic Ind. Co., Ltd.''']. **[http://www.rimec.de/content/Produkte/Steckverbinder/Board%20to%20Cable/Joint%20Tech/A1253.pdf Datasheet for the A1253 series connectors]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
